NC.Q: Between the flows from node Ranches to node Animal Feed and from node Orchards to node Landfills, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Orchards} to node {Landfills} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Bakeries to node Restaurants, from node Farms to node Animal Feed, and from node Restaurants to node Online Platforms, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Restaurants} to node {Online Platforms} is the largest.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Orchards to node Landfills, from node Ranches to node Landfills, and from node Orchards to node Animal Feed, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Orchards} to node {Animal Feed} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Food Sources of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Bakeries to target node Animal Feed? Please list all node labels along this path.
